channel.title: Hack Club YSWS Programs
channel.description: Active "You Ship, We Ship" programs from Hack Club

item.title: Clutter
item.description:
You ship something to organize your digital life. We ship you a grant to buy something to organize your physical life.

Deadline: September 17, 2025

Join the discussion in #clutter

item.description:
Make your own waveform visualizer, get a grant to buy music

Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

item.title: Penumbra
item.description:
Make shaders, and we'll ship you GPUs and posters!

Deadline: October 8, 2025

Penumbra is a YSWS, where you create shaders on ShaderToy, and get posters of your shaders shipped right to your doorstep! If you spend up to 45 hours across multiple ships, you'll be able to get a GPU like an RTX 3050!

Join the discussion in #penumbra

item.title: Hackberry
item.description:
Built a machine learning project in python, get a personalized raspberry pi kit!

Deadline: October 13, 2025

Join the discussion in #hackberry-hub

item.title: Reactive
item.description:
Ship a website built with React, get $15 to buy a domain.

Deadline: October 16, 2025

Join the discussion in #reactive

item.title: Fanpage
item.description:
Ship a project that celebrates a fandom, and we ship you something related to it!

Deadline: October 17, 2025

item.title: Emerge
item.description:
create an emergent behaviour, place pixels on the group canvas, get the canvas shipped to you!

Deadline: November 1, 2025

Join the discussion in #emerge

item.title: Haunted Halloween
item.description:
Make a halloween theme for a website or app, get a custom halloween themed sticker and candy!

Deadline: November 3, 2025

item.title: Converge
item.description:
Build Discord/Slack bots, we ship domain names, server hosting, Blahajs, and more

item.title: Remix
item.description:
Remix an existing song's beats in Strudel and get 1 month of Spotify, Apple Music, or SoundCloud Pro

Deadline: November 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #remixchallenge

item.title: The Zoo
item.description:
Make an animal themed Svelte site, earn Ikea Animal Plushies

Deadline: November 30, 2025

The Zoo is a Svelte YSWS where participants build an animal themed Svelte site and earn Mynts (currency) which can be turned into an HCB grant at the end to buy Ikea plushies. Get one giant Djungleskog, or multiple mini Blahaj, it's all up to you. Here's the best part: the better your submission is, the more Mynts you earn!

Join the discussion in #the-zoo

item.title: Playphone
item.description:
Work together to built a godot game, get a custom hackclub badge

Deadline: December 1, 2025

Playphonee is an event where people take turns working on one godot game, and try to build an amazing game together. Everyone who participates will get a cool hackclub badge

Join the discussion in #playphone

item.title: Siege
item.description:
Code every week, get prizes. Make it to the end, get a framework!

Deadline: December 8, 2025

Join the discussion in #siege

item.title: Dummies V2
item.description:
Learn A new Proggraming language and make a project with that, And We will send you school supplies, books, and study materials

Deadline: December 23, 2025

Join the discussion in #dummies

item.title: Meow
item.description:
Spend 5 hours building something to do with cats, get a cat plushie! Ends Christmas Day!

Deadline: December 25, 2025

Meow is a Hack Club YSWS where we'll send you a cat plushie if you ship a project to do with cats!

Join the discussion in #meow

item.title: Bauble
item.description:
3D model an ornament, get it printed and put on the HQ tree! Ends December 25th.

Deadline: December 25, 2025

Bauble is a Hack Club YSWS program where you 3D model an ornament, and you get it printed out put on Oscar, the tree at Hack Club‚Äôs HQ in Vermont! After the tree gets taken down, you'll receive your ornament in the mail!

Join the discussion in #bauble

item.title: Fudge
item.description:
Make any project you want, get fudge right from the Shelburne County Store next to HQ!

Deadline: December 31, 2025

Ship any project you want (tracked with Hackatime), get fudge from the Shelburne County Store right next to Hack Club HQ. Work for three hours and get half a pound of fudge, six hours for a full pound.

Join the discussion in #fudge-fudge-fudge

item.title: TerminalCraft
item.description:
Build a terminal program and earn 5$ per hour for building your program to get hackable hardware.

Deadline: December 31, 2025

Build & publish a cross-platform terminal app. Be creative, open-source it, and snag your grant !

Join the discussion in #terminal-craft
